name: Robot Robot
description:
Robot Robot is a small cooperative puzzle game where the two robots have to help each other to complete the levels.  It is recommended to play the game in local multiplayer with friends or family, because you are stronger together. But you can also play alone without any problems if you want. 

Controls:
Blue: WASD and E
Orange: Arrow-Keys and R-CTRL
UI: Mouse

This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021: "Stronger Together"

It's my first finished game, so any feedback is appreciated.

Thanks for playing and have fun!

https://twitter.com/HugisonGames/
